item.title: Definition of Personal God
item.description: A personal god, or personal goddess, is a deity who can be related to as a person instead of as an impersonal force, such as the Absolute.1 The God of the Bible’s Old Testament is described as a personal God.

item.title: The Way Things Are
item.description: This is the home page - and only page so far - of The Way Things Are. I hasten to point out I don’t claim to know exactly the way things are in the sense of “the way things all fit together”, or this how things are an no other way, period, end of discussion.

item.title: Wampeter
item.description: From Kurt Vonnegut’s Cat’s Cradle, a Wampeter is something that is currently serving as the vector or focus for your existence. This is a term created by Vonnegut so the interpretation of it certainly has some wiggle room.
